title: Math 101
description: Introduction to basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.

title: English Literature
description: Study of classic and modern works of English literature.

title: Computer Science
description: Fundamentals of computer programming and software development.

title: Biology 101
description: Exploration of foundational concepts in biology, including cell structure and genetics.

title: Physics 201
description: Advanced study of physics with a focus on mechanics and thermodynamics.

title: History of Art
description: A survey of major art movements and influential works throughout history.

title: Introduction to Psychology
description: Study of human behavior, mental processes, and foundational psychological theories.

title: Environmental Science
description: Overview of environmental challenges and sustainable solutions.

title: Business Management
description: Principles and practices of managing business operations and resources.

title: Creative Writing
description: Workshops focused on developing creative writing skills in fiction, poetry, and non-fiction.
